carryBackStrandedCart(PathFinder) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
This functions calls the a* algorithm in the PathFinder class 3 times to go from the stranded cart discovery coordinate back to the starting corner while taking wider turns to account for the increased length of the robot with the cart.
close() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.WifiConnection
The method to close connection between the data distributer and the robot.

The color field stored the current color detected by the color sensor.

The offset between color sensor and the wheel center of the robot width in centimeters.
colorController - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
The color controller for detecting color.
ColorDetectionController - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
This class is the controller of the color sensor which can detect the RGB values of object in the outside world.

coloredDotDetection() - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
This function performs a light sensor sweep above the stranded cart to figure out where the colored dot is positioned.

convertAngle(double) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.
convertDistance(double) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
Converts input distance to the total rotation of each wheel needed to cover that distance.
